HELP_MAN.name: Help Man
HELP_MAN.dialogue:
Hello There! When you get close to characters or objects, you will see a dialogue box like this one!

Be sure to read any new dialogue that you come across.

HELP_MAN_2.name: Help Man
HELP_MAN_2.dialogue:
You can press the TAB key to interact with certain objects!

You'll be notified if an object can be interacted with.

HELP_MAN_3.name: Help Man
HELP_MAN_3.dialogue:
You can press ESC at any time to go to the overworld map.

From there you will have access to commands that will help you navigate to other regions.

Try it out now

WHITE_RABBIT.name: White Rabbit
WHITE_RABBIT.dialogue:
I would help you, truly I would.

But I’m already late for something I don’t remember agreeing to.

If you wait long enough, you’ll be late too.

MAD_HATTER.name: Mad Hatter
MAD_HATTER.dialogue:
We don’t solve things here. We rearrange them until they look finished.

If it works, it was correct. If it doesn’t, it was still very interesting.

Some things refuse to act on their own.

Once things are PUSHED to where they belong, the way forward usually opens.

MARCH_HARE.name: March Hare
MARCH_HARE.dialogue:
You should have been here earlier.

Or later.

Either would have made more sense than now.

CHESHIRE_CAT.name: Cheshire Cat
CHESHIRE_CAT.dialogue:
Most paths lead somewhere.

Whether you’ll still be yourself when you arrive is the more important question.

I would smile about it, but I already am.

CATERPILLAR.name: Caterpillar
CATERPILLAR.dialogue:
Who are you?

No, not your name.

The part that keeps changing.

MOCK_TURTLE.name: Mock Turtle
MOCK_TURTLE.dialogue:
We studied very important things here.

I can’t recall what they were meant to prepare us for.

The lessons went on for years.

The understanding never arrived.

Still, it would be improper to say they were a waste.

KING_OF_HEARTS.name: King of Hearts
KING_OF_HEARTS.dialogue:
I agree with the Queen.

I always do.

It keeps things orderly.

DORMOUSE.name: Dormouse
DORMOUSE.dialogue:
I was awake when this started, I think. Everyone inside began moving at the same time. Not together, just… according to something.

I couldn’t tell when it was my turn. If you stop, you’re in the way. If you move too soon, you are also in the way. It’s easier to stay here and pretend I’m only resting.

If you can navigate through such a maze, good for you.

ALICE.name: Alice
ALICE.dialogue: You can't lie to yourself forever

PRISONER_ONE.name: Prisoner
PRISONER_ONE.dialogue:
They said the door would open when it was solved.

They didn’t say for whom.

Waiting feels like compliance.

PRISONER_TWO.name: Prisoner
PRISONER_TWO.dialogue:
I already solved my part.

Nothing changed.

Perhaps the puzzle was never the point.

PRISONER_THREE.name: Prisoner
PRISONER_THREE.dialogue:
At first, I thought this was punishment.

Now I think it’s storage.

Some things are kept, not corrected.

BLOCK.name: Block
BLOCK.dialogue: This is a block. When pushed it will slide in a straight direction until it hits something.

SWITCH.name: Switch
SWITCH.dialogue: This is a switch. You can activate it by pushing a block onto it!

DOOR.name: Door
DOOR.dialogue: This is a locked door. You'll need to figure out how to open it.

ITEM_1.name: Medical Report
ITEM_1.dialogue:
A condensed record of observations and conclusions. Checkboxes replace explanations.

Whatever mattered here was decided before you ever saw it.

ITEM_2.name: Personal Effects Bag
ITEM_2.dialogue:
A container meant to separate what belonged to you from what no longer does.

Everything inside has been reduced to inventory.

ITEM_3.name: Wristwatch
ITEM_3.dialogue:
The hands no longer move, yet the moment remains fixed.

You can’t remember when time stopped being useful.

ITEM_4.name: Identification Card
ITEM_4.dialogue:
A structured proof that you exist in the correct way.

The face matches. The relevance does not.

ITEM_5.name: Consent Form
ITEM_5.dialogue:
Multiple confirmations layered on top of each other.

Agreement achieved through repetition rather than understanding.

ITEM_6.name: Toe Tag
ITEM_6.dialogue:
A final label applied when conversation is no longer expected.

It records facts without asking if they mattered.

ITEM_7.name: Final Notice
ITEM_7.dialogue:
A confirmation that nothing further is required.

Closure, formally acknowledged.

FINAL_ITEM.name: Case Closure
FINAL_ITEM.dialogue:
An empty structure signifying completion.

No loose ends remain.

That is the official position.
